page.title: 19A Family Weekend in June
page.content: On Saturday I woke up at 9:15. My parents were off on holiday. My sister Pauline (who's 17) was watching us. I have a sister who is a teacher in France and is due home on the 14th of June. This was the 1st of June. We watched TV until 10:30am and then went shopping in Hamilton. Pauline works in my dad's pub, and at 11am she took us home and then went to work. My younger sister (Margaret) and I did the housework and then we went to Hamilton. Margaret stayed in the pub and listened to the records. Whilst walking around Hamilton, I met my friends and we went to 'Harrisons' as Diane wanted to buy a Pringle jumper, but they didn't have the colour she wanted so she didn't buy one. Clare and Debbie went home, then Diane and I went to 'Remnant Kings' to buy a roll of sequins for my dancing show. I went
